summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity for JEEPERS INC for the period of December 1, 2016, to December 31, 2016. It includes information on account balances, gains and losses, and transactions involving mutual funds and money market accounts. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account information, including account balances, transactions, and disclosures related to securities and investments. It includes important information regarding the roles of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and the responsibilities of the financial institution managing the account. This document contains financial statements and account activity for a portfolio held at Deutsche Bank, detailing transactions, balances, and income for the period of November 2016. It includes information on mutual funds, cash deposits, and withdrawals, as well as disclosures regarding the handling of securities and account management. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing portfolio holdings, transactions, and account activity for a specific period. It includes information on cash, mutual funds, and securities, as well as various financial transactions such as dividends and cash withdrawals. This document contains financial disclosures and account statements related to an account held at Deutsche Bank. It outlines account activity, including deposits, withdrawals, and investment performance over specified periods. The document emphasizes the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and includes important arbitration disclosures. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing transactions, account information, and important disclosures related to an account associated with 'Lepers Inc.' It includes information about securities transactions, cash withdrawals, and various financial disclosures, including arbitration agreements and tax information. This document contains a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing the account activities and portfolio holdings for a client, including cash deposits, withdrawals, dividends, and interest earned during the statement period. It provides insights into the client's investment performance and asset allocation. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to accounts managed by Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It outlines account activities, including deposits, withdrawals, and investment performance over specified periods. The document emphasizes the roles and responsibilities of Pershing LLC as the clearing broker and provides important arbitration disclosures. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management for an account associated with 'Lepers Inc.' It includes details about account balances, transactions, and disclosures regarding securities and investments. The statement covers a specific period and outlines various financial metrics and disclosures related to the account's performance. This document contains a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management detailing account transactions, including securities bought and sold, dividends received, and account management information. It outlines the role of Pershing as a clearing broker and provides important disclosures regarding transactions and account management. This document contains a financial summary and account activity report for a portfolio managed by Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It details gains and losses, income from various funds, and account balances over a specified period. The document also includes important disclosures regarding investment risks and account management. This document contains a financial summary and account activity report for a portfolio managed by Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It details gains and losses, cash flow activities, and investment transactions over a specified period, highlighting the management of various funds and securities. This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management for the account of 'Lepers Inc.' during the period of March 1, 2016, to March 31, 2016. It includes details about account balances, transactions, and investment performance, highlighting significant financial activities such as dividends received and cash withdrawals. This document contains financial statements and disclosures related to an account held by Jeffers Inc. with Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management. It outlines account activity, including deposits, withdrawals, and investment performance over a specified period. The document emphasizes the importance of arbitration agreements and the limitations of legal recourse in disputes with Pershing LLC. This document appears to be a financial statement from Pershing LLC detailing account information, pricing disclosures, and important arbitration disclosures related to securities transactions. It outlines the responsibilities of the financial institution and Pershing in managing the account, as well as the terms of arbitration for disputes.
